txt.en: Talk to Khôltekh
'I value success above all, Azagath.'
Remain on guard during the confrontation with Azagath
'How will these Thardúth, these Sere Ones, defeat our enemies?'
Remain on guard during the confrontation with Azagath
'Ancient sorceries? Deadly Orcs?'
'You wish to trade one Dark Lord for another, Azagath.'
'What say you, my friends?'
'The Kindred of the Coins will not serve such a master as this.'
'I believed you to have wisdom, despite your kind, Rothog.'
'I mourn to have been wrong.'
'What say you, Khôltekh?'
'They possess ancient sorceries even Sauron mastered not!'
'The Orcs they command are larger and deadlier than his own!'
Mithrandir and your companions prepare to confront the Thardúth.
'You DARE turn your back on me?'
'There will be no mercy here, old man.'
Servants of the Thardúth await you at Utug-bûr.
'Your lives must now be measured in minutes.'
Azagath Sea-shadow has suggested that his former allies among the Kindred of the Coins join his new cause.
'Good-bye, dead ones.'
'Steel your resolve, [placeholder]. We know not the precise nature of the evil we go to face... but we will face it all the same.'
The time has come for you and your companions to confront the Thardúth at Utug-bûr.
Your companions stand opposed to Azagath Sea-shadow and the Thardúth he now serves.
'We have found our quarry, [placeholder]. The journey that brought us from Umbar Baharbêl as allies is at its end. We have found Azagath.\n\n'But it seems someone else found him first.'
Your companions stand opposed to Azagath Sea-shadow and the Thardúth he now serves.
'TBD - Blah!'
'Sauron is dead, old man.'
'I have allied myself with a greater power now.'
Follow Mithrandir and your allies through the waterfall
'Khôltekh! Rothog!'
'My new friends have promised to serve the interests of the Kindred!'
'Will you join hands with me as you did before?'
'When they found me they were full of questions.'
Khôltekh glances at you briefly but says nothing. All of his attention is fastened upon Azagath.
'They desired to know the state of things in the world!'
'They agree that our enemies are theirs, Rothog.'
'They will begin with Gondor, as we planned!'
'Hmmmm....'
'I say NO, Azagath.'
'My way is \qHêlsi.\q'
'Freedom.'
'There will be no freedom beneath the heel of your new masters.'
'Forward, my friends, with courage!'
'You are the one called Azagath Sea-shadow, Gúrzyul of Sauron?'
'The Sere Ones keep no promises, save to Morgoth.'
'Surrender now, Azagath, and we will show you mercy!'
'Mithrandir! An army of reinforcements approaches!'
'Shagâni warriors and Kinta Elves march beside the river!'
Instance: A Greater Power
Talk to Mithrandir in front of the waterfall
Confront Azagath in front of Utug-bûr
Talk to Rothog
